TEXT.S:
Corey Benjamin
nilacul Corey Benjamin nalecuh i Compton, California, nanu syubay kanas-mali miunduay nu Amilika NBA nisakaput, pahanhanan tu kawaw ayza. Corey Benjamin i 1998 a mihcan NBA sapapili' mimaliay a kawaw, saka 1 ku uwac atu silsil 28, namapili' tu nu Chicago Bulls putiput. nalecuhan ciniza i 2 a bulad 24 a demiad, 1978 a mihcaan, Corey Benjamin, miunduay.
